text: <@U0UHG4VP1>: can we scale the graphic posted to <https://hub.docker.com/u/hyperledger/> so that it doesn’t take up a whole page view?
cbf: unfortunately the size of that graphic is chosen by dockerhub. I’ve removed it from the account, but it means we lost all branding and now we get a placeholder. does that look better?
I guess we can restore the logo but we need an SVG so that it doesn’t look blurry
The implementation is gravatar, which doesn’t support SVG. <https://en.forums.wordpress.com/topic/how-to-use-an-svg-image-as-a-gravatar>
who is the marketing genius that designed this site;-)
ok, do we have a png that scaled better?
I’ll ask - perhaps we have better assets.
<@U0KM61BCP>: I updated the assets on gravatar; it looks more crisp, but it’s probably still 12 inches square <https://hub.docker.com/u/hyperledger/> :slightly_smiling_face:
